name: Project Dude Demo
description:
Project dude is a turn based multiplayer (via LAN networking) game!
In this demo you can play as either the Foxman, Boarman, Fishman, Human, or Bear as you work with your friends to navigate a maze and fight the party animal!
Be careful tho; the party animal will place a hot potato in a player's inventory which will explode and kill the holder! And if that doesn't kill you the bugs in our code might anyways!

Controls: 
move with WASD, change camera angle with JL, zoom with IK, select button with space (except for beginning menu :p), move back a menu with ESC

We hope you enjoy.
